en.title: Foreign Lawyer in Sharm El Sheikh â€“ Specialized Legal Services for Residents and Visitors
en.excerpt: Your complete guide to specialized legal services for foreigners in Sharm El Sheikh - residency, property, companies, marriage and divorce

content.text: Sharm El Sheikh is one of Egypt's most important tourist cities and a preferred destination for foreigners whether for residence, investment, or property purchase. With the increasing number of residents and visitors, having a lawyer specialized in foreign affairs in Sharm El Sheikh has become essential to ensure legal procedures are completed correctly and smoothly.

In this article, we review the most important legal services provided by Lawyer Karim El-Dib, who specializes in foreign cases and procedures in Egypt, while highlighting the importance of having a professional lawyer who understands Egyptian and international laws related to foreigners.

Foreigners in Egypt have specific laws related to:

items: Marriage and divorce for foreign residents
Procedures before passport authority and government entities
